name: axorbtnotaiffb

body.origin:
|- wn(wb(w0, w1))
-| wxo(w0, w1)
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wb(w0, w1))
-| wxo(w0, w1)
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))

comment: Given a is exclusive to b, there exists a proof for (not (a if-and-only-if b)); ~ df-xor is a closed form of this. (Contributed by Jarvin Udandy, 7-Sep-2016.)
